STEP Goals

Frequently Asked Questions
Frequently Asked Questions

This proposal has a strong implementation plan which should be effective. But it is not very innovative. How much emphasis should be placed on innovation?
This proposal has a strong implementation plan
which should be effective. But it is not very
innovative. How much emphasis should be
placed on innovation?

The emphasis in the proposal should be on the adaptation and implementation of best practices. (For innovative strategies, include compelling arguments for increases in STEM graduates.)
The emphasis in the proposal should be on the
adaptation and implementation of best
practices. (For innovative strategies, include p r a c t i c e s .

i n n o v a t i v e
s t r a t e g i e s ,
i n c l u d e
compelling arguments for increases in STEM
graduates.)

Frequently Asked Questions
Frequently Asked Questions

Is a proposal that targets underrepresented students or women as STEM graduates better than one that does not?
Is a proposal that targets underrepresented
students or women as STEM graduates
better than one that does not?

A narrow target audience may reduce the likelihood of success of achieving the STEP’s primary goal – increasing the total number of STEM graduates.
A narrow target audience may reduce the
likelihood of success of achieving the
STEP’s primary goal – increasing the total
number of STEM graduates.

Frequently Asked Questions
Frequently Asked Questions

A proposed project aims only at increasing graduates in one science discipline. How should this be viewed?
A proposed project aims only at increasing
graduates in one science discipline. How
should this be viewed?

This approach may be OK if the arguments are convincing and the numbers are significant, but not if it just results in a disciplinary shift of students.
This approach may be OK if the arguments
are convincing and the numbers are
significant, but not if it just results in a
disciplinary shift of students.

Frequently Asked Questions
Frequently Asked Questions

Very little of the STEP budget is being used for direct student support, like scholarships. How should this be viewed?
Very little of the STEP budget is being used for
direct student support, like scholarships. How
should this be viewed?

Fundamentally, STEP is about “infrastructure” change. It is not “principally “ a scholarship program.
Fundamentally, STEP is about “infrastructure”
change. It is not “principally “ a scholarship
program.
